title: The whole duty of mourning and the great concern of preparing our selves for death, practically considered / written some years since by the author of The whole duty of man, and now published upon the sad occasion of the death of our Most Gracious Sovereign Lady Mary the II, Queen of England, &c. of blessed memory.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
notes: "Necessary to be given at all funerals."
Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Allestree.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
